video.title: Paradise PD
video.synopsis: An eager young rookie joins the ragtag small-town police force led by his dad as they bumble, squabble and snort their way through a big drug case.

episodes.synopsis: At 18, Kevin Crawford finally gets a shot at joining the police force run by his dad, just as a new drug dubbed "argyle meth" hits the streets.
episodes.title: Welcome to Paradise

episodes.synopsis: Bullet finds fame and glory in an underground dogfighting ring, and Chief Crawford butts heads with his biggest rival on a maddening homicide case.
episodes.title: Ass on the Line

episodes.synopsis: At Gina's insistence, Fitz starts carrying a gun -- and ignites a national media scandal. Shipped off to a nursing home, Hopson uncovers a conspiracy.
episodes.title: Black & Blue

episodes.synopsis: When Kevin's mom buys him a sleek new talking police car, it's love at first sight. Bullet turns Dusty into a fried-chicken kingpin.
episodes.title: Karla

episodes.synopsis: When Preacher Paul ropes the cops into his war against a "satanic cult" of D&D players, Bullet makes a move on the preacher's virtuous daughter.
episodes.title: Dungeons & Dragnet

episodes.synopsis: After finding a clue to her past, Gina sets out on a quest for revenge and bonds with her long-lost family -- leaving Paradise without a tough cop.
episodes.title: Meet the Jabowskis

episodes.synopsis: While Kevin and his dad face off in the police academy Coptathalon, Bullet runs the station and Dusty helps Hopson take care of unfinished business.
episodes.title: Police Academy

episodes.synopsis: The hunt for the argyle meth mastermind leads Kevin and his task force to the circus. A cash-strapped Dusty auctions off his virginity on the dark web.
episodes.title: Task Force

episodes.synopsis: Kevin's plan to reunite his family backfires in a big way. After seeing his DNA test results, Dusty vows to stop the town's Thanksgiving parade.
episodes.title: Parent Trap

episodes.synopsis: As Dusty scrambles to get Paradise ready for a visit from Santa, Kevin races to root out the traitor on the force.
episodes.title: Christmas in Paradise

episodes.synopsis: As tourists flock to the new, peaceful Paradise, Gina plots to bust Dusty out of prison, Kevin savors his hero status, and Karen plans an execution.
episodes.title: Paradise Found

episodes.synopsis: On Kevin Sucks Day, Fitz hunts down a new meth supplier, the chief discovers Karen's secret fetish, and Kevin vows to defy an embarrassing prediction.
episodes.title: Big Ball Energy

episodes.synopsis: A rant by Tucker Carlson sparks a war of the sexes, leaving Paradise with two police forces. Fitz's new evil plan is thwarted by Gal-Qaeda.
episodes.title: Tucker Carlson Is a Huge D**k

episodes.synopsis: Dusty finds a long-lost sitcom star living in Paradise and sets out to reboot his career. The squad obsesses over Kevin's bathroom habits.
episodes.title: Who Ate Wally's Waffles

episodes.synopsis: With crime at an all-time high, Chief Crawford decides to steal the Kingpin case back from Agent Clappers. Fitz runs into major money trouble.
episodes.title: The Father, the Son and the Post-it Note

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to win reelection, Karen legalizes meth — inspiring Fitz to run against her. The chief recruits Dobby for a mission. Bullet visits hell.
episodes.title: Flip the Vote

episodes.synopsis: Fleeing Paradise, the gang crosses over into Brickleberry National Park, just in time to help Ranger Woody and crew hunt for missing bear Malloy.
episodes.title: Paradise PD Meets Brickleberry

episodes.synopsis: After learning that Fitz isn't quite what he seems, the squad races to stop their real enemy — and save Paradise from a nuclear disaster.
episodes.title: Operation DD

episodes.synopsis: Chief Crawford develops an unlikely, unhealthy and unholy friendship. Delbert and Robby form a new country. Fitz adjusts to married life.
episodes.title: Fallout

episodes.synopsis: Paradise PD juices its arrest stats in order to win a cop contest. Fitz gets a new identity. Dusty terrorizes a father-son doughnut shop.
episodes.title: Top Cops

episodes.synopsis: Chief wants another kid, but he must prove to Karen that his dad skills have improved. Robby opens a carnival. Dusty turns the screws on Fitz.
episodes.title: Ice Ice Babies

episodes.synopsis: Does the town of Paradise have a gun problem? Depends on who you ask. Also, Dusty bribes Bullet to appear in his online videos.
episodes.title: Trigger Warning

episodes.synopsis: Dusty inspires a revolution at Weight Watchers. Bullet worries Gina may have an addiction. Fitz's wife lands a job at SeaWorld.
episodes.title: Showdown at the O-bese Corral

episodes.synopsis: Dusty gives Fitz a new identity: "Family Feud" host Steve Harvey. Meanwhile, Chief Crawford tries stealing his own sperm from a fertility clinic.
episodes.title: How The Cookie Crumbles

episodes.synopsis: Lovelorn Kevin invents an imaginary girlfriend in hopes of making Gina jealous. Chief Crawford learns the town never repealed Prohibition.
episodes.title: Blind Drunk

episodes.synopsis: Paradise PD combats the city's drone menace. Karen's mother, Agatha, moves in to help with baby prep. Kevin offers to assist Gina with her tech issues.
episodes.title: Blimp City

episodes.synopsis: Karen asks Chief to play nice with Hopson, but the task proves surprisingly humiliating. Kevin tries to get Gina into Live Action Role Playing.
episodes.title: The World According to LARP

episodes.synopsis: The mutants enter stage three in their quest for revenge. Gina's family kidnaps Kevin. The Chief worries his unborn child has it in for him.
episodes.title: Fetal Attraction

episodes.synopsis: Karen bets big, hoping a new casino will raise enough money to rebuild Paradise. Kevin's relationship with Gina remains stubbornly platonic.
episodes.title: What Happens in Twatemala

episodes.synopsis: Gina and Kevin make a big announcement, Bullet worries Fitz is on the verge of an unpleasant discovery, and Dusty joins a "gym."
episodes.title: PARAD-ISIS
